name: Deep Space Destroyer
description:
The SpacePort is under attack! You are the only engineer left conscious after the initial impact and boarding of the evil robot forces. Fighting them head to head isn't the best idea for you, you're just an Engineer!

Get over to the Robot Asteroid Base and take the Nuclear Reactor from their core, that should deactivate and stop those robots rightin their tracks!

--- Created two new levels of bigger scale and size, that flow together to create a sense of progression through the minor "story". Added skyboxes, deathplanes,  a ton of visual props, and traps to help give each level its own identity. ---

Made by: Jeff Barker
